summary: This document details a rejected outgoing transfer request involving Jeffrey Epstein and Southern Financial LLC. The rejection was due to a tax ID mismatch, indicating potential issues with the account's validity.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder associated with the rejected transfer request.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer Request Rejected
events.description: A transfer request involving Jeffrey Epstein and Southern Financial LLC was rejected due to a tax ID mismatch.

keyFacts: The document records a rejected outgoing transfer request dated April 9, 2019.
The rejection was due to a tax ID mismatch.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the account holder for Southern Financial LLC.
